Photographer: [Photographer's Name] If the photographer's name is not known please indicate IPPA Staff as the Photographer
label: Several youths of the leftists movement demonstrated in Tel Aviv in support of Danny Amir who was send to prison as he refused to be mobilized into the IDF and serve in the occupied territories.
